title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 17.2 - Applicability of standard claim forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 17.2 - Applicability of standard claim forms

State Regulations

All commercial insurers providing accident and health insurance in New York State and all article IX-C corporations shall accept the standard claim forms established by the Superintendent of Insurance when submitted by physicians, dentists or by a hospital for services rendered in New York State to an individual covered by an accident and health policy, or when submitted directly by an insured for covered services. comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
